content: this simple flower granny square pattern makes a beautiful granny square it makes a unique and beautiful square that would be beautiful in a crochet blanket or crochet afghan if you can chain single_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet treble_crochet magic_ring and slip_stitch you can create this beautiful granny square get creative on your yarn color choices and bring this crochet granny square to life
